name: Swordlord
description: Swing the sharp end of your pixelated weapon into your enemies! Use momentum, your body and your wits to slay your enemies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
